events.title: A Sudden Stillness
events.narration: Galadriel weaves a binding ward from Caras Galadhon over the road. Your nearest forces are halted and cannot advance this turn. Messengers report the road is bound by unseen will, and the march falters for a time. Light of the Golden Wood chills the heart of those who stand against her.

events.title: Galadriel Marks a Target
events.narration: Galadriel sends a hunter from Caras Galadhon to cut down your closest hero. The strike is swift and deliberate, leaving them wounded and reeling. The wound is not fatal, but it leaves scars and slows any bold advance. Light of the Golden Wood chills the heart of those who stand against her.

events.title: Galadriel Undermines the Gate
events.narration: Galadriel directs a precise strike against the closest defenses from Caras Galadhon. A bastion falls, and the fort line is reduced. Stones that took years to raise come down in hours, and the breach yawns wide. Light of the Golden Wood chills the heart of those who stand against her.

events.title: Steps Denied
events.narration: A sudden stillness grips the way from Imladris. By Elrond's will, your closest host is halted in place. Messengers report the road is bound by unseen will, and the march falters for a time. The river-song of Bruinen carries his will, and Rivendell's lore turns to peril.

events.title: Elrond Breaks the Walls
events.narration: Elrond dispatches sappers and siege crews from Imladris to undermine your nearest walls. The stone cracks, and a layer of fortifications is brought down. Dust and rubble spill into the streets. Stones that took years to raise come down in hours, and the breach yawns wide. The river-song of Bruinen carries his will, and Rivendell's lore turns to peril.

events.title: Sedition in the Streets
events.narration: A quiet campaign of whispers spreads from Imladris. Under Elrond's hand, your nearest population center turns against you. Trust frays and old loyalties are tested as rumor turns neighbor against neighbor. The river-song of Bruinen carries his will, and Rivendell's lore turns to peril.

events.title: Sappers of Thanduil's Halls
events.narration: Thranduil dispatches sappers and siege crews from Thranduil's Halls to undermine your nearest walls. The stone cracks, and a layer of fortifications is brought down. Dust and rubble spill into the streets. Stones that took years to raise come down in hours, and the breach yawns wide. From the deep halls beneath the Forest River, his folk move like shadows.

events.title: Thranduil Sows Doubt
events.narration: An envoy of Thranduil arrives from Thranduil's Halls with soft words and harder promises. Loyalty frays in your nearest town as neighbors turn on one another. Trust frays and old loyalties are tested as rumor turns neighbor against neighbor. From the deep halls beneath the Forest River, his folk move like shadows.

events.title: Thranduil Lays Siege
events.narration: Thranduil orders a grinding siege from Thranduil's Halls against your nearest town. Hunger and fear do the rest as the settlement shrinks by a level. Hunger, fear, and dwindling stores do more damage than blades. From the deep halls beneath the Forest River, his folk move like shadows.

events.title: Veil of Shadow
events.narration: Murazor shrouds the land in darkness from Minas Morgul. Roads vanish into black and your scouts are blinded. Morgul fumes drift from the vale, sickening the air. A choking gloom smothers torchlight and makes every step uncertain. The pale light of Minas Morgul stains the horizon and saps courage.

events.title: Sappers of Minas Morgul
events.narration: Murazor dispatches sappers and siege crews from Minas Morgul to undermine your nearest walls. The stone cracks, and a layer of fortifications is brought down. events.title: Murazor Lays Siege

Hunger, fear, and dwindling stores do more damage than blades. The pale light of Minas Morgul stains the horizon and saps courage.

events.title: Khamul Undermines the Gate

events.title: Akhorahil Calls the Dark

A choking gloom smothers torchlight and makes every step uncertain. Corsair oars beat in distant waters, and the rumor of Umbar sharpens dread.

events.title: A Dreadful Whisper

events.title: Ji Indur Seizes a Relic

What is taken is carried far from honest hands, and its loss is keenly felt. Caravans whisper of Kal Nargil and its patient spies.

From the black clefts of the Misty Mountains comes a screeching chorus.

events.title: Assault from Goblin Town
events.narration: A host under Goblin King slips through the wilds from Goblin Town and falls upon your closest town. The blow is deliberate, a show of force to weaken your grip on the marches. Misty Mountain tunnels spill out raiders in the dark. The raid is swift and cruel, a reminder that the border is never safe. From the black clefts of the Misty Mountains comes a screeching chorus.

events.title: Tom Bombadil Sows Doubt
events.narration: An envoy of Tom Bombadil arrives from Old Forest with soft words and harder promises. Loyalty frays in your nearest town as neighbors turn on one another. Old Forest songs twist the path, and the land itself answers him. Trust frays and old loyalties are tested as rumor turns neighbor against neighbor. The Old Forest stirs; roots and water heed his strange mirth.

events.title: Sabotage of Supplies
events.narration: Tom Bombadil orders sabotage from Old Forest. Crates are split, grain is fouled, and multiple goods are lost. Old Forest songs twist the path, and the land itself answers him. Spoiled stores and broken casks leave the mustering yards bare. The Old Forest stirs; roots and water heed his strange mirth.

events.title: A Stolen Heirloom
events.narration: A clever thief serving Tom Bombadil targets your nearest champion and steals an artifact before anyone can react. The relic is gone, and the trail runs cold. Old Forest songs twist the path, and the land itself answers him. What is taken is carried far from honest hands, and its loss is keenly felt. The Old Forest stirs; roots and water heed his strange mirth.

events.title: Stonework Shattered
events.narration: The Undead King dispatches sappers and siege crews from Paths of the Dead to undermine your nearest walls. The stone cracks, and a layer of fortifications is brought down. Dust and rubble spill into the streets. The Paths of the Dead chill even the bold. Stones that took years to raise come down in hours, and the breach yawns wide. The Dead do not sleep, and their whispers cling to the living.

events.title: The Undead King Sets the Snare
events.narration: A tight cordon forms under The Undead King from Paths of the Dead. The enemy line holds the pass, and your nearest host is forced to halt and bleed. The Paths of the Dead chill even the bold. Pickets and skirmishers choke the approaches, turning the road into a killing ground. The Dead do not sleep, and their whispers cling to the living.

events.title: Border Raid of The Undead King
events.narration: A host under The Undead King slips through the wilds from Paths of the Dead and falls upon your closest town. The blow is deliberate, a show of force to weaken your grip on the marches. The Paths of the Dead chill even the bold. The raid is swift and cruel, a reminder that the border is never safe. The Dead do not sleep, and their whispers cling to the living.

events.title: A Sudden Stillness
events.narration: Pallando weaves a binding ward from Elgaer over the road. Your nearest forces are halted and cannot advance this turn. Messengers report the road is bound by unseen will, and the march falters for a time. The Blue Wizard's counsel travels far along the southern roads.

events.title: A Whispered Betrayal
events.narration: An envoy of Pallando arrives from Elgaer with soft words and harder promises. Loyalty frays in your nearest town as neighbors turn on one another. Trust frays and old loyalties are tested as rumor turns neighbor against neighbor. The Blue Wizard's counsel travels far along the southern roads.

events.title: A Sudden Stillness
events.narration: A sudden stillness grips the way from Laorki. By Alatar's will, your closest host is halted in place. Messengers report the road is bound by unseen will, and the march falters for a time. The Blue Wizard's designs are patient, woven along the eastern roads.

events.title: A Wound in the Dark
events.narration: An agent loyal to Alatar strikes at your nearest champion. The blow is unsentimental and leaves the target wounded before help can arrive. The wound is not fatal, but it leaves scars and slows any bold advance. The Blue Wizard's designs are patient, woven along the eastern roads.

events.title: Stonework Shattered
events.narration: From Derndingle, engineers loyal to Treebeard work through the night. By dawn the gates are weakened and your fortifications drop a tier. Fangorn stirs and the trees remember old wrongs. Stones that took years to raise come down in hours, and the breach yawns wide. Fangorn's ancient anger wakes, and the wood itself judges trespass.

events.title: Treebeard Tightens the Noose
events.narration: Siege lines close under Treebeard from Derndingle. The nearest settlement withers as supplies fail and the population is reduced. Fangorn stirs and the trees remember old wrongs. Hunger, fear, and dwindling stores do more damage than blades. Fangorn's ancient anger wakes, and the wood itself judges trespass.

events.title: Treebeard Sets the Snare
events.narration: Treebeard throws a skirmish screen across the approaches from Derndingle. Your nearest host is pinned and harried, its march stolen by ambush and arrow-fire. Fangorn stirs and the trees remember old wrongs. Pickets and skirmishers choke the approaches, turning the road into a killing ground. Fangorn's ancient anger wakes, and the wood itself judges trespass.

events.title: Silent Cut
events.narration: An agent loyal to Celdacil strikes at your nearest champion. The blow is pragmatic and leaves the target wounded before help can arrive. The wound is not fatal, but it leaves scars and slows any bold advance. Quiet blades and harder coin are his common tools.

events.title: Sedition in the Streets
events.narration: A quiet campaign of whispers spreads from Shrel-Kain. Under Annatorion's hand, your nearest population center turns against you. Trust frays and old loyalties are tested as rumor turns neighbor against neighbor. Shrel-Kain's shadowed courts trade in rumor and unrest.

events.title: Night on the Road
events.narration: Barrow-wight shrouds the land in darkness from Barrow-downs. Roads vanish into black and your scouts are blinded. Cold from the barrows creeps into your bones. A choking gloom smothers torchlight and makes every step uncertain. Cold mists roll from the downs, numbing bone and spirit.

events.title: Barrow-wight Unleashes a Warband
events.narration: A host under Barrow-wight slips through the wilds from Barrow-downs and falls upon your closest town. The blow is deliberate, a show of force to weaken your grip on the marches. Cold from the barrows creeps into your bones. The raid is swift and cruel, a reminder that the border is never safe. Cold mists roll from the downs, numbing bone and spirit.

events.title: Wizard-Fire
events.narration: Barrow-wight kindles wizard-fire from Barrow-downs. Your nearest troops are seared by the burning spell and forced to scatter. Cold from the barrows creeps into your bones. The air reeks of smoke and sorcery as the flames bite and then fade. Cold mists roll from the downs, numbing bone and spirit.

events.title: Knife in the Shadows
events.narration: Gwaihir sends a hunter from Eagle's Eyrie to cut down your closest hero. The strike is swift and deliberate, leaving them wounded and reeling. Wings shadow the sky as the Eagles descend without warning. The wound is not fatal, but it leaves scars and slows any bold advance. The wind bears his cry, and the Eagles' shadow turns day to dusk.

events.title: Stonework Shattered
events.narration: Huz directs a precise strike against the closest defenses from Riavod. A bastion falls, and the fort line is reduced. Stones that took years to raise come down in hours, and the breach yawns wide. Riavod's riders are swift, and their banners are seen from far hills.

events.title: Huz Locks the Pass
events.narration: Huz throws a skirmish screen across the approaches from Riavod. Your nearest host is pinned and harried, its march stolen by ambush and arrow-fire. Pickets and skirmishers choke the approaches, turning the road into a killing ground. Riavod's riders are swift, and their banners are seen from far hills.

events.title: Huz Strikes from Riavod
events.narration: A host under Huz slips through the wilds from Riavod and falls upon your closest town. The blow is deliberate, a show of force to weaken your grip on the marches. The raid is swift and cruel, a reminder that the border is never safe. Riavod's riders are swift, and their banners are seen from far hills.

events.title: Azog Marks a Target
events.narration: An agent loyal to Azog strikes at your nearest champion. The blow is black-hearted and leaves the target wounded before help can arrive. Gundabad horns sound a harsh, brutal warning. The wound is not fatal, but it leaves scars and slows any bold advance. Gundabad's drums answer his call, and orc-eyes burn with malice.

events.title: Azog Undermines the Gate
events.narration: Azog directs a precise strike against the closest defenses from Gundabad. A bastion falls, and the fort line is reduced. Gundabad horns sound a harsh, brutal warning. Stones that took years to raise come down in hours, and the breach yawns wide. Gundabad's drums answer his call, and orc-eyes burn with malice.

events.title: Azog Sets the Snare
events.narration: Azog throws a skirmish screen across the approaches from Gundabad. Your nearest host is pinned and harried, its march stolen by ambush and arrow-fire. Gundabad horns sound a harsh, brutal warning. Pickets and skirmishers choke the approaches, turning the road into a killing ground. Gundabad's drums answer his call, and orc-eyes burn with malice.
